greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Lexicographically earliest such sequence a that a(i) = a(j) => A185633(i) = A185633(j) for all i, j.
comment: Restricted growth sequence transform of A185633.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: rgs_transform(invec) = { my(om = Map(), outvec = vector(length(invec)), u=1); for(i=1, length(invec), if(mapisdefined(om,invec[i]), my(pp = mapget(om, invec[i])); outvec[i] = outvec[pp] , mapput(om,invec[i],i); outvec[i] = u; u++ )); outvec; };
A185633(n) = { my(m=1); fordiv(n, d, if(isprime(1+d), m *= (1+d)^(1+valuation(n,1+d)))); (m); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 03 2018
